mean_cn: n. 千斤顶；男子；起重器；【牌戏】J牌；  vi. 用篝灯打猎；  vt. 顶起；提高
mean_en: a device used for lifting something heavy (such as a car)
short_phrase: raise the car with a jack
sentence: I have a jack to lift my car up if I need to make any repairs.
sentence_trans: 我有一个千斤顶以便在我需要修车时可以举起车子。
sentence_phrase: a jack to lift my car up
